tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Loans (
    loan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL,
    interest_rate DECIMAL,
    repayment_terms VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT,
    borrower_id INT,
    lender_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
